Item.name: COMMUNITYPROJECT_DOWNLOAD_INCREMENT
Item.sqlserver_body:
create procedure COMMUNITYPROJECT_DOWNLOAD_INCREMENT(@PROJECT_ID CHAR(32)) AS BEGIN
declare @NAME as VARCHAR(64) SET @NAME = (select name from CP_COMMUNITYPROJECT where id=@PROJECT_ID) if @name IS NULL BEGIN Select 'FAILURE: Project not found' as result_text return END
Update CP_COMMUNITYPROJECT set DOWNLOADS = DOWNLOADS + 1 where id=@PROJECT_ID
select 'SUCCESS' as result_text
END
